# KokonutUI - UI Component Library

A beautiful collection of UI components built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, and Motion.

## Components

**Action Search Bar** - Action Bar with shortcuts, and smooth dropdown animation.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/action-search-bar

**AI Input Search** - AI input with search mode.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/ai-input-search

**AI Input Selector** - My own style of chat AI input.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/ai-prompt

**AI State Loading** - Code loading pending.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/ai-loading

**AI Text Loading** - Thinking mode.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/ai-text-loading

**AI Voice** - Voice mode.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/ai-voice

**Apple Activity Card** - Inspired by Apple activity app.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/apple-activity-card

**Avatar Picker** - Avatar picker with rotation animation.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/avatar-picker

**Background Paths** - Drawed line paths in the middle.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/background-paths

**Beams Background** - Animated Beams in the background that are customizable.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/beams-background

**Bento Grid** - Grid of 4 cards with different content and animations.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/bento-grid

**Card Flip** - Animated flip card with gradient button and animation.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/card

**Command Button** - Command button for shortcut.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/command-button

**Currency Transfer** - Multiples step animation transaction inspired.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/currency-transfer

**Dynamic Text** - Dynamic switcher text.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/dynamic-text

**File Upload** - File upload with special uploading animation. Make sure to try the drag and drop.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/file-upload

**Glitch Text** - Why not?
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/glitch-text

**Gradient Button** - That was so hard to make.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/gradient-button

**Hold Button** - Hold Button with different hold duration and colors.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/hold-button

**Liquid Glass** - Liquid Glass inspired by @Apple
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/liquid-glass-card

**Loader** - Simple Loading
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/loader

**Magnet Button** - Attract particles button!
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/attract-button

**Matrix Text** - "010110010110111101110101011100100010000001110111011001010110110001100011011011110110110101100101"
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/matrix-text

**Mouse Effect Card** - Interactive card with animated dot pattern that responds to mouse movement.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/mouse-effect-card

**Particle Button** - Particle Button Animation on click.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/particle-button

**Profile Dropdown** - Menu dropdown with action buttons.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/profile-dropdown

**Scroll Text** - Animated on scroll texts.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/scroll-text

**Shapes Hero** - Shapes that fall from the top.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/shape-hero

**Shimmer Text** - Quite fancy.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/shimmer-text

**Sliced Text** - I haven't found any usage for that component, but i like it.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/sliced-text

**Smooth Drawer** - Smooth slide-in drawer. (this was harder than i thought to make that one)
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/smooth-drawer

**Smooth Tab** - Animated tab switcher.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/smooth-tab

**Social Button** - Animated Social show-up
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/social-button

**Stack** - Stack of cards that expend onclick.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/card-stack

**Switch Button** - Animated shadow theme switcher button.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/switch-button

**Swoosh Text** - Nike inspired Text
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/swoosh-text

**Team Selector** - Group selector with a different style.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/team-selector

**Toolbar** - Multiples actions toolbar inspired by Figma.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/toolbar

**Typing Text** - Animated TypeWritter with multiples options.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/typewriter

**V0 Button** - Open in V0.
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/v0-button

**X Card** - Gradient on hover X card. (The post is real!)
https://kokonutui.com/docs/components/tweet-card

## Links

- Github: https://github.com/kokonut-labs/kokonutui
- Sitemap: https://kokonutui.com/sitemap.xml
